ygData.subject: RE: Your kidding me
ygData.msgSnippet: Flashbacks are caused by a brain hemorrhage, which is caused by bad LSD... the rat poison or other harmful type.  I didn t say all LSD had no side effects, I
ygData.messageBody:
Flashbacks are caused by a brain hemorrhage, which is caused by bad LSD...
the rat poison or other harmful type. I didn't say all LSD had no side
effects, I said morning glory LSD (much like paode) had no permanent
damages.

-----Original Message-----
From: errors-159870-3079-opium=punkass.com@onelist.com
[mailto:errors-159870-3079-opium=punkass.com@onelist.com]On Behalf Of
Greg McTague
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 8:01 AM
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eq_wizards] Your kidding me


From: Greg McTague <gmctague@...>

Well..i STAND corrected. Hmmmm...No side effects from LSD...I am glad that
you corrected that ugly rumor of "flash backs". I'll have to inform some of
my former patients, that they are must have been affected by bad chicken or
something. Sorry all..i thought this was an EQ_Wizards list not the forum
for recreational drug users .


<<Message: 1
Date: Mon, 13 Sep 1999 08:34:40 -0500
From: "Richard Slater" <opium@...>
Subject: RE: Disappointments with everquest.

Heh, I harvest all of my own indulgences. I don't buy them from dealers,
and I suggest not doings so because they put anything from rat poison to
embalming fluid on their products to enhance it (killing your brain in the
mean time).

Now, about trying something new. How is whoever you got your information
about drugs so righteous? It seems you have a strong fear against them, I
would also if they are dealer sold, rat poison LSD is not very good for
you.Although opium and morning glory LSD have no known long term effects
(unliketobacco and alcohol).

Also I noticed that my original spelling of disappointments was wrong.
Anyways what am I rambling at (another fun feature of substances) I need to
get to school.I give up on whatever we wear arguing about, lets never
mention it again.>>
